dcterms:description: The DvsGesture dataset comprises 1,342 instances of a set of 11 hand and arm gestures, grouped in 122 trials collected from 29 subjects under 3 different lighting conditions. The gestures include hand waving, large straight arm rotations, forearm rolling, air guitar, air drums, and an 'Other' gesture invented by the subject.
dcterms:title: DvsGesture

dcterms:creator: Y. Hu
H. Liu
M. Pfeiffer
T. Delbruck
dcterms:description: DVS benchmark datasets for object tracking, action recognition, and object recognition.
dcterms:title: DVS datasets for object tracking, action recognition, and object recognition

dcterms:creator: J. H. Lee
T. Delbruck
M. Pfeiffer
P. K. Park
C.-W. Shin
H. Ryu
B. C. Kang
dcterms:description: The only extant DVS dataset for gesture recognition, which is not large enough to reliably train a CNN.
dcterms:title: The only extant DVS dataset for gesture recognition

dcterms:creator: C. Tan
S. Lallee
G. Orchard
dcterms:description: Four frame-based datasets converted to event-based representation by recording the output of a DVS camera pointed at a screen displaying the data.
dcterms:title: Four frame-based datasets converted to event-based representation
